page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: To find out how people are{employed}in Lapford, we asked as many children in school as possible what their father and mothers did at{work}and also how they{travelled}there.We were able to ask thirty six children,and the{jobs} worked out as follows:-Farmers-10; Office workers 8; Lorry drivers 4; Pub workers 4; Builders 3; Mechanics 2; council workers 2; and there was one each fireman , lift repairer ,washing machine repairer .Every single one who had to{travel},went by car or motor bike . Not a singie person travelled by {public transport}and nearly every one who travelled , worked in Exeter or Crediton.
